replies.replyComment: @MS Lake ratakata arthikayak thiyenna oni. Sema ratakama anannyathawayak thiyenna oni arthikamaya sanwardanayak wenna. Sudda ewith issellama kodiwina kale bududhamata mokada un denagaththa me rata wattanna puluwa ekama karane bududhama winasa kirimen bawa. Ehi prathipalayak lesai oba weni matha darannanda ada samajaye nirmanaya wi eththe. Yalu methana obe wereddak ne obe watapitawai awla. Awlak ne me rata deyagodaganna matawitharak karanna be. Obath mamath ekathu wenna oni ewitai sarthaka wenna heki. Eka ratak eka agamak eka jathiyak eka prathipaththiyak thiyenna oni. Ammai gedara amma wereddak kalahama ekata daduwamak denna oni hebei e ammage maththruthwayata haniyak nowana paridi. Mokada amma ammama wana nisa. Mokada eyatath athmayak thibena nisa. Ewitai loke mawa kiyana kena araksha wanne. Ape minissu karanne uda balagena kela gahaganna eka witharai. Oba wennan meweni adahas idiripath kirima udabalagena kelagahagenimak noweda. Ranja ese kiwwath ohu baninne allapu gedarata ohu udabalagena kelagahaganne ne. Eheth meme kaaraneda samahara baddhayange adahas hari modai. Loke nithiya hemotama eka wenna oni. Eth eka kriyathmaka kala yuththe yam kenekuge athmaya pirisidu kirimata misak athmaya kelaseemata nowa. Oba nithiya igenagena etha eth oba thula loku adupaduwak etha...eya obama soya ganna
